description.original: This plugin allows you to quickly remove image attachment and referenced link from your documents in both LIVE , READ mode by right-click menu
description.translation: 次插件允许您通过右键点击菜单，在LIVE，READ中快速删除图像附件和引用链接

dict.Notice(` cannot get the image file`): Notice(` 无法获取图像文件`)
dict.Notice(\"Image moved to Obsidian Trash !: Notice("将图像移至Obsidian回收站 ！", 成功_通知_超时)
dict.Notice(\"Image moved to System Trash !\": Notice("将图像移至系统回收站 ！", 成功_通知_超时)
dict.Notice(\"Image deleted Permanently !\",: Notice("将图像永久删除 ！", 成功_通知_超时)
dict.Notice(\"Faild to delelte the image !\",: Notice("将图像移至Obsidian回收站 ！", 成功_通知_超时
dict.Notice(\"Failed to delete the file/folde: Notice("图像删除失败 ！", 成功_通知_超时)
dict.Notice(\"All attachments and its parent: Notice("所有的附件及子文件已被删除", 3e3)
dict.text: \" Detection of multiple attachmen: text: " 检测到多个附件参考链接 - 日志 "
dict.text: \"Detected that the image you are: text: "检测到您尝试删除的图像在当前文档中被多次引用。 \因此，我们请求您手动删除链接"
dict.text: \"Delete the file and its all atta: text: "删除附件及所有附件 - 日志 "
dict..setDesc(\"Select where you want Attachm: .setDesc("删除附件后选择您希望移动的位置")
